mapper.select: select id, nav_type_name, nav_parent_type_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete from nav_type where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into nav_type(nav_type_name, nav_parent_type_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete) values (#{navTypeName}, #{navParentTypeId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{isDelete})

insert into nav_type(nav_type_name, nav_parent_type_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.navTypeName}, #{entity.navParentTypeId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateBy}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into nav_type(nav_type_name, nav_parent_type_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.navTypeName}, #{entity.navParentTypeId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastUpdateBy}, #{entity.lastUpdateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update nav_type_name = values(nav_type_name), nav_parent_type_id = values(nav_parent_type_id), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), last_update_by = values(last_update_by), last_update_time = values(last_update_time), is_delete = values(is_delete)
mapper.update:
update nav_type
nav_type_name = #{navTypeName},
nav_parent_type_id = #{navParentTypeId},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
